parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The playbook UUID.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the playbook UUID.

parameters.name: Record
parameters.description: The input parameters that you use to debug the playbook. You can define the parameters based on your business requirements.

parameters.name: Taskflow
parameters.description:
The XML configuration of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybook](~~DescribePlaybook~~) operation to query the XML configuration of the playbook.
